dct_title_s: A map of the Province of New-York reduc'd from the large drawing of that Province, compiled from actual surveys by order of His Excellency William Tryon, Esqr. Captain General & Governor of the same
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Prime meridian: New York. Shows administrative boundaries in New York and New Jersey. Also shows portions of Pennsylvania and New England. Princeton copy 1: Imperfect: bottom edge trimmed with loss of imprint. Historic Maps copy 1 imperfect: bottom edge trimmed with loss of imprint.
dct_subject_sm: New York (State)—Administrative and political divisions—Maps—Early works to 1800
New Jersey—Administrative and political divisions—Maps—Early works to 1800
